column1: * 1956 - J.R.R. Tolkien receives a letter from a Sam Gamgee – from Tooting (see Letter 184).
** Borondir and his companion are on their way in search of the Éothéod.
** Frodo Baggins is stung by Shelob and subsequently captured by the Orcs of Cirith Ungol.
** The Pelennor Fields is overrun by the enemies of Gondor.
** Faramir is brought back to Minas Tirith badly wounded.
** Aragorn arrives at Pelargir and captures Corsairs of Umbar.
** Beregond sees a strange light in the tower of Minas Tirith

column2: on the anniversary of his poisoning by Shelob.
